Customizing Legend Displays

Using the Windows client, you can easily manipulate chart legends, displaying or hiding them, moving them to a different position in the chart, and changing them from floating to fixed type. You can also change the appearance of the legends. For example, you can draw a border around the legend, display or hide a splitter bar, add a 3D frame, skip empty entries, wrap text lines, legends, and skip entries without labels.

Using the Cross-Platform client, you can display or hide legends.

The sections below describe the options available for customizing your legend displays in the Windows and Cross-Platform clients.

Using the Windows Client to Customize Legend Displays

To display or hide chart legends or series legends:

  1. Do one of the following to display legends.

    • Toggle the Show Legend button on the Chart window toolbar to display or hide legends.

    • Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar, and select or deselect Legend from the menu.

  2. Do one of the following to display or hide chart series legends.

    • Toggle the Show Series Legend button on the Chart window toolbar to display or hide series legends.

    • Click the Tools button on the Chart window toolbar, and select or deselect Series Legend from the menu.

To change legend location or type:

  1. Drag the legend to a new location anywhere on the screen. If the location is a window edge, the legend docks there. If it is not, the legend floats, which allows it to be moved and resized like a window.

  2. Alternatively, point anywhere in the legend and right-click. This action displays a legend context menu.

    • Select Left, Top, Right, or Bottom to place the legend in one of those locations.

    • Select Float to create a window for the legend. Then you can resize the legend by dragging any side of the legend or reposition the legend by dragging it to a new location.

    • Select Fixed to dock a floating legend at its current location on the chart.

    Tip: You can also double-click a legend to switch between floating and fixed legends.

To select legend options:

  1. Display a chart.

  2. Point at the legend and right-click. The legend context menu opens.

  3. Click Options. The Legend Options dialog opens.

  4. Select one or more of the following options:

    • Draw Border: Select to add or clear to remove a border around the legend.

    • Draw Splitter: Select to add or clear to remove a splitter bar. Once you have displayed the bar, you can drag it to the appropriate location to change the amount of window space allotted to the chart and the legend.

    • 3D Frame: Select to add or clear to remove a frame around the legend.

    • Skip Empty: Select to add or clear to delete entries without labels from the legend. The text used in a legend is also displayed along an axis. If you delete the text for an entry in the legend, it also deletes that label from the axis. By selecting this option, however, you delete only those entries that have values of zero from the legend.

    • MultiLine: Select to allow the labels to wrap from one line to the next. Individual words will not become hyphenated, however, so the end of a word may be truncated. To display each label on only one line, clear the box.

  5. Click OK.

See also Changing Text Fonts or Colors.

 

Using the Cross-Platform Client to Customize Legend Displays

To toggle a legend display for your chart:

  1. Display a chart.

  2. Click the Toggle legend button on the Chart window toolbar to remove the legend from view.

  3. To show the legend, click the Toggle legend button again.
